TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AppSettingsExpressionBuilder extends System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionBuilder

summary.span: 從 Web.config 檔案的 區段，擷取宣告式運算式中所指定的值。

span.span: Retrieves values, as specified in a declarative expression, from the section of the Web.config file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別提供存取值在``Web.config 檔案區段。The class provides access to values in the `` section of the Web.config file. `` Web.config 檔案區段包含索引鍵/值組中的應用程式特定值。The `` section of the Web.config file contains application-specific values in key/value pairs. 擷取應用程式值是將表單的運算式An application value is retrieved by assigning an expression of the form `<%$ AppSettings: appSettingsKey %>` 若要控制宣告中的屬性。to a property in a control declaration. 之後的冒號表示索引鍵的一部分的冒號 （:） 前後的運算式會指定運算式來擷取，並將部分的類型。The part of the expression before the colon (:) designates the type of expression to be retrieved, and the part after the colon signifies the key. 上述運算式會從 Web.config 檔案擷取下列的值。The preceding expression would retrieve the following value from the Web.config file. `` `` `` 當頁面剖析器遇到與運算式`AppSettings`前置詞，它會建立的執行個體類別來處理的運算式。When the page parser encounters an expression with the `AppSettings` prefix, it creates an instance of the class to handle the expression. 如果運算式中的頁面，將會編譯發生物件產生程式碼以從 Web.config 檔案中擷取指定的值。If the expression is encountered in a page that will be compiled, the object generates code to retrieve the specified value from the Web.config file. 此程式碼會產生的頁面類別的執行期間執行。This code is executed during the execution of the generated page class. 如果運算式中的頁面，不會被轉譯時，發生物件時，傳回值的 Web.config 檔案中剖析和執行的頁面。If the expression is encountered in a page that will not be compiled, the object returns the value from the Web.config file when the page is parsed and executed. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何擷取未編譯的頁面中的應用程式設定值。The following code example demonstrates how to retrieve an application settings value in a page that is not compiled. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Compilation.AppSettingsExpressionBuilder#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Compilation.AppSettingsExpressionBuilder/CS/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Compilation.AppSettingsExpressionBuilder#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Compilation.AppSettingsExpressionBuilder/VB/Default.aspx#1)] 此程式碼會從 Web.config 檔案擷取下列運算式。This code retrieves the following expression from the Web.config file. `` `` `` `` ``

span.span: ASP.NET Expressions Overview

span.span: The associated with a key in the section of the Web.config file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 格式的運算式時，會呼叫這個方法`<%$ AppSettings: someApplicationSetting %>`發生無編譯頁面中。This method is called when an expression of the form `<%$ AppSettings: someApplicationSetting %>` is encountered in a no-compile page. 它會擷取適當的值中的索引鍵/值組從``Web.config 檔案區段。It retrieves the appropriate value from the key/value pairs in the `` section of the Web.config file. 這個方法會覆寫藉由呼叫方法屬性設為`key`參數，屬性屬性設為`propertyName`參數，而的`target`參數做為`targetType`參數。This method overrides by calling the method with the property as the `key` parameter, the property on the property as the `propertyName` parameter, and the of the `target` parameter as the `targetType` parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會擷取適當的值中的索引鍵/值組從``Web.config 檔案區段。This method retrieves the appropriate value from the key/value pairs in the `` section of the Web.config file. 藉由取得擷取的值做為索引鍵屬性。The value is retrieved by getting the property with the key as the index. 產生的字串值會轉換成新的類型，根據`targetType`和`propertyName`參數。The resulting string value is converted to a new type based on the `targetType` and `propertyName` parameters.

-or-

summary.span: 傳回程式碼運算式，用來在產生的頁面類別中執行屬性指派。

span.span: Returns a code expression that is used to perform the property assignment in the generated page class.
A that is used in the property assignment.

remarks.format: ## Remarks CodeDOM 建立期間呼叫這個方法的頁面或控制項。This method is called during the CodeDOM creation for a page or control. 傳回物件代表將新增至產生的頁面類別中的屬性指派的程式碼運算式。The returned object represents the code expression to add to the property assignment in the generated page class.

member this.SupportsEvaluate : bool

summary.span: 傳回值，指出是否可在未編譯的頁面中評估運算式。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether an expression can be evaluated in a page that is not compiled.
in all cases.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會指出是否方法已實作類別中，並可傳回運算式的值。The property indicates whether the method has been implemented in the class and can return a value for the expression. 必須實作內的運算式未編譯的頁面中評估運算式產生器。 must be implemented within an expression builder for an expression to be evaluated in a page that is not compiled. 類別會支援未編譯的頁面中的應用程式設定評估讓它永遠都會傳回`true`。The class supports evaluation of an application setting in a page that is not compiled, so it always returns `true`.

span.span: ASP.NET Expressions Overview
